name: Earnsured Asset Management
slogan: Creating a sustainable investment through Crypto/Blockchain mutual fund
description: We provide investors an opportunity to earn income passively from a diversified and stable portfolio in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. Our investment strategies checkmates volatility, thus reducing loses to the barest minimum.

jobs.title: Affiliate Marketing Manager (Remote)
jobs.description:
Earnsured is looking for an experienced Affiliate Marketing Manager, joining our fast-paced global marketing team, to help the company grow to the next level through Affiliate Marketing.

This role will manage and grow our global affiliate partners, whilst also building upon our affiliate marketing processes and strategies.

This role can be based remotely anywhere in the world or on-site in the location listed.

Responsibilities:
Manage and build upon relationships with affiliate partners
Acquire new partners to grow the affiliate scheme
Analyse campaign activity to ensure affiliates deliver the best ROI
Manage the affiliate budget, including commission and budget spend
Oversee all affiliate campaigns ensure their integrity and that they meet our standards
Deliver affiliate marketing reports to senior management
Initiate new campaign ideas, incentives and bonuses for the affiliate scheme
Develop the affiliate marketing strategy with the aim of recruiting new affiliate partners and delivering sales volume
Ensure timely and accurate invoicing by agencies and affiliates
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Earnsured is looking for an experienced Affiliate Marketing Manager, joining our fast-paced global marketing team, to help the company grow to the next level through Affiliate Marketing.

This role will manage and grow our global affiliate partners, whilst also building upon our affiliate marketing processes and strategies.

This role can be based remotely anywhere in the world or on-site in the location listed.

Responsibilities:
Manage and build upon relationships with affiliate partners
Acquire new partners to grow the affiliate scheme
Analyse campaign activity to ensure affiliates deliver the best ROI
Manage the affiliate budget, including commission and budget spend
Oversee all affiliate campaigns ensure their integrity and that they meet our standards
Deliver affiliate marketing reports to senior management
Initiate new campaign ideas, incentives and bonuses for the affiliate scheme
Develop the affiliate marketing strategy with the aim of recruiting new affiliate partners and delivering sales volume
Ensure timely and accurate invoicing by agencies and affiliates

jobs.title: Marketing Representative
jobs.description: In a quest to become a globally recognized Digital Asset management company, we are currently employing marketing representatives from various countries. The duty of the marketing rep is to create awareness of our company in their countries, pitch, and try as much as possible to get interested investors to invest with our company. For each successful referral, there is an 8% referral commission plus an attractive monthly salary which is subject to increment if the marketer records an awesome performance.
